meanings.definition: Covered with or smelling of gas.
meanings.sent1: The kitchen was gazy after the gas leak.
meanings.sent2: The swampy area had a gazy odor.
meanings.sent3: The gazy room made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her gazy perfume filled the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The gazy cloud enveloped the entire city.

meanings.sent1: The gazy stove needed immediate repair.
meanings.sent2: The gazy balloon slowly floated away.
meanings.sent3: The gazy car seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: The gazy chimney released smoke into the sky.
meanings.sent5: The gazy volcano erupted with a loud roar.

meanings.sent1: The gazy mist obscured the view.
meanings.sent2: The gazy mirage in the desert fooled the travelers.
meanings.sent3: The gazy painting seemed to come to life.
meanings.sent4: Her gazy eyes sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The gazy figure disappeared into thin air.
